V

validateAttachement(Attachment) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.MonomerParser
This method validates Attachment by the following rules
Attachment must have unique ID
cap group SMILES must be valid
cap group SMILES must contain one R group
R group in SMILES must match R group label
validateAttachmentLabel(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.MonomerParser
This method checks if attachment label is in the format of R#, where # is a number
validateComplexNotation(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.ComplexNotationParser
This methods validates the complex polymer extendendNotation
validateComplexPolymer(ComplexPolymer) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.ComplexNotationParser
This methods checks Nodes and Edges matches, and checks validity of each node label
validateMonomer(Monomer) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.MonomerParser
This methods checks the validity of the monomer based on the following rules
monomer cannot be null
polymer type cannot be null and must be one of the defined polymer type
monomer type cannot be null and must be one of the defined monomer type for a given polymer type
Monomer ID cannot be null
structure cannot be null for non-chemical type monomer
structure SMILES must be valid
attachment labels on monomer must be unique
Attachment number on SMILES must match attachment List size
Each attachment in attachment list must be valid (call validateAttachment())
Attachment labels on monomer must match atachment label on attachment list
For non-chemical type monomers, modified monomer (ID length greater than 1) must have natural analog
All monomers must have at least one attachment
validateMonomerReplacement(String, String, String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
 
validateNotationFormat(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.ComplexNotationParser
 
validateSimpleNotation(String, String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
This method checks if simple polymer notation is valid
validateSimpleNotationForChem(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
validate chem simple notation
validateSimpleNotationForPeptide(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
validate peptide simple notation
validateSimpleNotationForRNA(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.SimpleNotationParser
validate RNA simple notation
validateSmiles(String) - Static method in class org.helm.notation.tools.StructureParser
This methods validates if the provided SMILES string is valid or not Can be called by any program interested in SMILES validation
